CA.name: Ice Cream Surfer
CA.description: The evil Broccoli, irritated by the fact that kids hate vegetables and love ice creams, has created an army of vegetables to destroy the flavor galaxy. Only the Ice Cream Surfer with the help of his 4 super tasty friends can prevent that. 6 different worlds - You will travel the whole Gourmet Universe to get to the No-Flavor Zone and destroy the bad taste. Each world is completely different and has its own enemies. Action packed - Each world has its own giant final Boss. 16bits graphics - Every single sprite has been drawn Pixel by Pixel, to get the look from the 90's classics. “Woah, nice graphics!” Epic sound track - Melodies and sound effects that will bring you back those feelings from the time you were playing arcade games.

MX.name: Ice Cream Surfer
MX.description: El malvado Broccoli, harto de que los niños odien comer verduras y adoren los helados, ha creado un ejercito de verduras para acabar con el mundo de los sabores. Solo el Surfero Helado con ayuda de sus 4 súper sabrosos amigos, deberán evitarlo. 6 mundos diferentes - Viaja por todo el universo Gourmet. Cada mundo es completamente diferente y tiene sus propios enemigos. Freneticas batallas - Acaba con el enorme Final Boss de cada nivel. Gráficos 16bits - Dibujos al estilo clasico, para conseguir que luzcan como los clásicos de la década de los 90. Épica banda sonora - Melodías y efectos de sonido que le llevarán de vuelta a los salones recreativos de antaño.
